post.title: Episode 37 - IDA...Go home, Sandboxie source, and some RCEs (TP-Link, Starcraft 1, OhMyZsh)
post.description: Starting off the week with a discussion about the disappointing IDA Home, before moving into a few easy command injections, code-reuse attacks applied to XSS, detecting trojaned hardware and ending with a subtle crypto-bug.
post.content:
Starting off the week with a discussion about the disappointing IDA Home, before moving into a few easy command injections, code-reuse attacks applied to XSS, detecting trojaned hardware and ending with a subtle crypto-bug.
